txt.en: Something has caused the creatures of the Wódfen to go mad
Something has driven the creatures of the Wódfen mad... some to the point of death.
Something has driven the creatures of the Wódfen mad... some to the point of death.\n\nYou should find the source of the madness.
You should scour the Wódfen for clues to the source of the madness that has overcome the wildlife there.
You should scour the Wódfen for clues to the source of the madness that has overcome the wildlife there.
The entrance to the draugar's cave must be somewhere in the Wódfen.\n\nYou should seek the entrance to the draugar's cave.
Draugar can be found in their cave, as well as in the Wódfen at night.\n\nYou should purge the Wódfen of the draug-threat.
Discover the source of the madness in the Wódfen
Discover the source of the madness in the Wódfen
The madness in the Wódfen appears to have been caused by a strange form of the Dead like none you have seen before
